alert.note: Alert for Natchitoches; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 10:41AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Red River and north central Natchitoches Parishes through 1115 AM CST... At 1039 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Campti, or 10 miles northwest of Natchitoches, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Campti, Goldonna, Ashland, Powhatan, Black Lake, Chestnut and Creston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This cell has shown weak rotation. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
